gameName: Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition
reports_summary: Community testing shows Fallout 3 plays very differently depending on the Deck: the OLED build sustained 60+ FPS when capped at 60 on high settings, while the LCD unit typically sat around 30 FPS with a 30 FPS cap. Testers gave performance good marks, though classic Bethesda instability can still surface for some players. Battery life reflects that gap — roughly six hours on the lower‑draw OLED run versus about four hours on the LCD under the reported settings — so expect smoother motion with a higher cap but shorter sessions as the trade‑off.
